title: Scimitar Stall

properties.name: description
properties.value: Scimitar Stall is a unique stall found on Ape Atoll. It is owned by Daga, the only person to sell a Dragon Scimitar in his store - Daga's Scimitar Smithy. Players with level 65 Thieving can steal from this stall roughly every 40 seconds, but this is risky due to the monkey archers, Padulah and other surrounding dangers unless the player has completed Monkey Madness II.

Scimitar Stall
Released6 December 2004 (Update)

ExamineThis table has a scimitar on it.
Map
Advanced data
Object ID4878

Scimitar Stall is a unique stall found on Ape Atoll. It is owned by Daga, the only person to sell a Dragon Scimitar in his store - Daga's Scimitar Smithy. Players with level 65 Thieving can steal from this stall roughly every 40 seconds, but this is risky due to the monkey archers, Padulah and other surrounding dangers unless the player has completed Monkey Madness II.
